This function is called when each of the inventories is first loaded and whenever the player picks up an item - it ensures that the array stores the correct number of pages in the InvPages variable and the savegamedata is updated
These actions update the quantities of the items that are dropped or picked up
If there is only a single item left in the category, the cell is simply reset to zero
If the array has multiple items, the cell corresponding to the current item slot is simply removed.
If there are multiple of one item, then they're discarded one at a time every time the Z key is pressed.
If the inventory is empty, we add the item to the first slot in the array and then update the dictionary.

actions.text: Edit these actions to use the return function to get ItemName

children.text: If the inventory already has items in it, we add the item as a new slot in the array and then update the dictionary
if Inventory isn't visible, make it appear
